name: Lawachurl Mantodipietra
desc:
"Vale-Crosser" Stonehide Lawachurl

Go around — the way ahead is the realm of the "king."

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#ffffff>Stonehide</color> and <color=#ffffff>Stone Force</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Stonehide</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the character to which this is attached receives DMG</color> : Decrease DMG taken by 1. When Geo DMG is decreased, consume 1 additional <color=#ffffff>Usage(s)</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Stone Force</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Once per Round</color> : The character deals +1 DMG. Once the Stonehide attached to the character is removed, this status will be removed alongside it.

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

customize.name: Lawachurl Mantodipietra
customize.desc:
"Vale-Crosser" Stonehide Lawachurl

Go around — the way ahead is the realm of the "king."

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Carta animata vuota
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Stonehide Lawachurl's Rest

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "Even the might Stonehide Lawachurl must find some time to relax..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Stonehide Lawachurl" starts with the Talent Card "Stonehide Reforged" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." The Stonehide Lawachurl is not one to relax during a fight. It's got to show its strength, after all!"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Stonehide Lawachurl" starts with the Talent Card "Stonehide Reforged" equipped.</color>

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Stonehide Lawachurl

value.name: Lawachurl Mantodipietra
value.desc:
Un misterioso "Signore" degli Hilichurl che percorre migliaia di vette.

Questo enorme Hilichurl viene chiamato "Lawa" dai suoi compagni.

Le abbondanti energie di Geo nell'ambiente sono diventate parte della sua carne, del suo sangue e della sua pelle, quasi come se fosse stato scolpito nella roccia.
